channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: How to stream the 2026 Super Bowl for free this weekend: Patriots vs. Seahawks time, where to watch and more
item.description:
The 2026 Super Bowl between the New England Patriots and the Seattle Seahawks will air on NBC this Sunday, Feb. 8. The game will also stream on Peacock. If you don't have NBC over the air and don't subscribe to Peacock, there are still ways to watch Super Bowl LX — and Bad Bunny's history-making halftime show — for free. Here's how to tune in. How to watch Super Bowl LX free:
Date: Sunday, Feb. 8 Time: 6:30 p.m. ET Location: Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, Calif. TV channel: NBC, Telemundo Streaming: Peacock, DirecTV, NFL+ and more 2026 Super Bowl game channel Super Bowl LX will air on NBC...

item.title: Spotify’s About the Song offers context and trivia about your favorite tracks
item.description: Spotify is launching About the Song in beta today, which offers context and facts about the song you're listening to. Premium users can scroll down to the new About the Song section for information while in the Now Playing view. At launch, it's only available for a limited number of tracks, but there are plans […]

item.title: A rare win for RAM buyers — Corsair’s 32GB Vengeance DDR5-6000 kit is heavily discounted at Newegg right now
item.description: Save nearly $60 on the 32GB Corsair Vengeance DDR5-6000 kit right now, a rare win for RAM buyers.

item.title: J’ai visité l’usine du Porsche Cayenne électrique, et j’ai vu comment le futur rentrait au chausse-pied dans des installations du passé
item.description: La Porsche Cayenne électrique est la voiture la plus puissante de toute l'histoire du constructeur allemand. Nous sommes partis en Slovaquie pour visiter l'usine qui la produit. On a vu des batteries XXL, des moteurs ultra-performants... et des gros moteurs essence V8. On vous emmène avec nous.

item.title: 19 Best Food Gifts to Buy Online, as Tested by Our Tastebuds (2026)
item.description: From tinned fish to baked goodies, you can deliver the best-tasting treats to their door—even if you don’t live close by.

item.title: Even with a new planet, fresh characters and many freebies, I'm most excited about the collectible card game coming in Honkai Star Rail's Version 4.0 update
item.description: Here's everything coming in the new Honkai Star Rail 4.0 update – and why all of my time will be lost to the new collectable card game.

item.title: Anthropic says its new Opus 4.6 platform found over 500 previously unknown high-severity security flaws in open-source libraries during testing
item.description: New Opus improves significantly than the previous generation, Anthropic says, urging defenders to deploy it ASAP.

item.title: La France et l’Espagne déclarent la guerre à TikTok et Shein
item.description: Mettre fin au régime juridique de responsabilité limitée des plateformes en ligne : c'est le plan du ministre français du Commerce Serge Papin. Et c'est aussi celui du Premier ministre espagnol Pedro Sanchez.

item.title: Apple Is More Serious About AI Devices Than We Thought
item.description: Recent comments from Tim Cook and a blockbuster acquisition are painting an interesting picture of Apple's interest in AI hardware.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 6 marketing will officially kick off this summer ahead of its November launch, which Take-Two CEO is sure won't be delayed again — 'We don’t spend money on marketing until we’re pretty close to release'
item.description: Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick seems confident that Grand Theft Auto 6 won't be delayed from its November launch date, since marketing is officially set to begin this summer.

item.title: This legendary hi-fi maker's new ultra-powerful amp has a network port so you can study voltages and bias in realtime — oh, and it costs £123k for a stereo pair
item.description: You'll need a pretty amazing pair of speaker to justify this amp, but it's made for the truly hardcore hi-fi nerds

item.title: Pourquoi les Français changent moins souvent d’opérateur
item.description: Le dernier baromètre de l'Arcep dessine le portrait d'un marché français de la téléphonie arrivé à maturité : moins de portabilités, davantage de forfaits sans engagement et une croissance toujours en hausse du parc mobile. Pour autant, la baisse de la mobilité des abonnés ne traduit pas un recul de la concurrence.

item.title: The best live TV streaming services to cut cable in 2026
item.description: People who are interested in a live TV streaming service are probably looking for one (or all three) of the following: current sports matchups, breaking news and cable-like channels. We tried all the major providers to see what you get for your monthly bill — particularly in light of the fact that every live TV streamer has raised prices over the past year or two. That said, in most markets, a live TV streaming service is still more cost-effective than cable. And you still don’t have to sign a contract. Right now, we think YouTube TV is the most well-rounded option — but the others might have ...

item.title: The best tech gifts for $100 or less from Apple, Nintendo, Google and others
item.description: Finding a gift for the tech nerd in your life can be tough. They likely have all the tech they need and then some, but you can add to their kit with the right accessories. Apple, Samsung, Sony and other big tech companies all have affordable gear that comes in at $100 or less, you just have to know where to look. Below are some of our favorites, but it's worth remembering: you can often find alternatives that are just as good (and sometimes better) than these. But for the people in your life for which brand names really do matter, these gifts will speak to them. Best tech gifts for $100 or les...

item.title: Aura’s Aspen digital frame is a great gift, especially now that it’s $30 off
item.description: Aura’s Aspen digital photo frame is a great Valentine’s Day gift if you want something that’s slick and sentimental, and right now it’s on sale for $199 ($30 off) at Amazon, Best Buy, and Aura’s online storefront. That’s the lowest we’ve seen the frame sell for since the holidays. With its paper-textured, antiglare matte display […]

item.title: Nacelle’s New ‘Star Trek’ Toys Are Summoning You to the Bridge (Exclusive)
item.description: Nacelle's upcoming line of 'Star Trek' action figures is building up the classic TOS playset of your dreams.

item.title: Skip the Apple Watch 11 — I tell everyone to buy the Apple Watch SE 3 instead, and here's why
item.description: Don't buy the new Apple Watch 11 - I recommend the budget Apple Watch SE 3 instead, and it's on sale for only $219 at Amazon right now.

item.title: An $88 Million Satellite Died Early—and Still Blew the Lid Off Industry Emissions
item.description: Researchers have released an initial assessment of the emissions data MethaneSat gathered before it suddenly went dark. The findings are damning.

item.title: Volkswagen abandonne ses technologies maison : le plan de la dernière chance face à BYD en Chine
item.description: Face à l'effondrement de ses ventes sur le marché chinois, Volkswagen met de côté ce que l'on connaît en Europe et confie l'architecture de toutes ses voitures électriques et hybrides vendues en Chine au constructeur chinois Xpeng d'ici 2030.

item.title: Cet écran MSI en Full HD avec une fente intégrée pour ranger ses câbles perd 40 % de son prix chez Darty
item.description: Le MSI PRO MP2412 coche toutes les cases attendues de la part d'un écran PC avec sa dalle Full HD de 23,8 pouces, mais il ne s'affirme pas comme une référence dans le domaine. Pour seulement 59,99 euros au lieu de 99,99 euros chez Darty, on n'en demande pas davantage.

item.title: Jobs, activités, histoire, fonctionnalités : tout ce que contient la version d’essai de Final Fantasy 14 [Sponso]
item.description: Saviez-vous que l’un des RPG en ligne les plus marquants de ces quinze dernières années était (presque) gratuit ? Avec sa version d’essai gargantuesque, Final Fantasy 14 vous permet de découvrir son univers sans débourser un centime.

item.title: Une simple couche de gel pourrait régler le plus gros problème des panneaux solaires
item.description: Les recherches se poursuivent pour améliorer les technologies d’énergie renouvelable. Du côté du solaire, des scientifiques ont mis au point un revêtement innovant capable de refroidir les panneaux et ainsi d’augmenter leur production.

item.title: Spotify now lets you swipe on songs to learn more about them
item.description: Spotify is rolling out a feature called About the Song which lets fans learn a bit more about their favorite tunes. This "brings stories and context" into the listening experience, sort of like that old VH1 show Pop Up Video. How does it work? The Now Playing View houses short, swipeable story cards that "explore the meaning" behind the music. This information is sourced from third parties and the company promises "interesting details and behind-the-scenes moments." All you have to do is scroll down until you see the card and then swipe. This is rolling out right now to Premium users on both i...

item.title: Conduent data breach might have been much worse than initially expected
item.description: Tens of millions of people are most likely affected by the January 2025 Conduent breach.

item.title: These cheap DualSense accessories are a fixture of my PS5 setup and prove you don't have to throw money around to improve your game
item.description: I can't remember the last time I used a DualSense controller without these cheap PS5 accessories

item.title: The Kindle Scribe Colorsoft is a pricey but pretty e-ink color tablet with AI features
item.description: If you primarily want a tablet device to mark up, highlight, and annotate your e-books and documents, and perhaps sometimes scribble some notes, Amazon's new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft could be worth the hefty investment.

item.title: Get a four-pack of first-gen AirTags for only $64
item.description:
Good deals on Apple products aren’t as frequent as we’d like them to be, but if there’s one of the company’s products that does seem to enjoy pretty regular price cuts, it’s the AirTag. Right now you can pick up a four-pack of Apple’s diminutive first-generation Bluetooth trackers for $64, which translates to 35 percent off and a near record low price.
Bear in mind that this deal brings the price per AirTag down to about $16 if you were to buy them individually, and when not on sale they usually cost $29. The single first-gen AirTags are also on sale right now, and you can pick one up for 41...

item.title: The Only Thing Standing Between Humanity and AI Apocalypse Is … Claude?
item.description: As AI systems grow more powerful, Anthropic’s resident philosopher says the startup is betting Claude itself can learn the wisdom needed to avoid disaster.

item.title: Iguanas Fell From Trees During Florida Cold Snap—and the Numbers Are Staggering
item.description: Government and private pest control services have collected roughly 8,000 frozen iguanas from across the state.

item.title: Flickr est victime d’une fuite de données
item.description: Flickr a été victime d’une fuite de données chez l’un de ses prestataires. En exploitant une vulnérabilité dans l’outil de messagerie, un tiers a pu consulter des données personnelles sur les clients de la plateforme.

item.title: EU says TikTok must disable ‘addictive’ features like infinite scroll, fix its recommendation engine
item.description: The European Commission on Friday accused TikTok of purposefully designing its app to be "addictive," calling out features such as infinite scroll, autoplay, push notifications, and its recommendation engine.

item.title: The Alexa app is so bad I’m using Siri again
item.description: I've used Alexa to manage my shopping list for years. There are plenty of great list apps out there, but the convenience of adding items by voice anywhere in my house, pulling up the list on an Echo Show in the kitchen, and having it on my phone via the Alexa app has worked well […]

item.title: EU Says TikTok’s ‘Addictive Design’ Likely Violates the Law, Will Need to Change
item.description: European regulators issued a preliminary finding that the app’s design likely violates the bloc’s laws.

item.title: Top investment platform hit in data breach - over 1.4 million Betterment accounts exposed
item.description: Betterment accounts were not compromised, but users might start getting phishing emails.

item.title: Sur ce site les IA louent des humains pour les faire travailler : le délire de science-fiction est devenue une réalité
item.description: Être payé pour toucher de l’herbe, tenir des pancartes en public, ou tester des restos italiens, ça vous tente ? Sur RentAHuman.ai, c'est possible. La plateforme propose en effet à des IA de louer des humains pour réaliser des tâches dans le monde réel. En échange de leur temps, les personnes louées reçoivent des cryptomonnaies.

item.title: How rising complexity is reshaping the role of data center services
item.description: The capacity to install, integrate, monitor and maintain hardware directly influences long-term performance.

item.title: The Olympics May Have a Penis Problem Thanks to Ski Jumping
item.description: German newspaper BILD reported on the alleged penis-gate last month.

item.title: Réparations illimitées et batterie remplacée : Samsung muscle son assurance pour les Galaxy
item.description: Samsung annonce une évolution de son programme de protection des appareils Galaxy. L’assurance Samsung Care+ devient désormais illimitée pour les utilisateurs européens, mettant fin aux restrictions sur le nombre de réparations couvertes.

item.title: Amazon Prime members are being treated to 21 games in February, including free access to Tiny Tina's Wonderlands and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants DLC
item.description: Amazon Luna's monthly freebies for February have been revealed, and included are Indiana Jones and the Great Circle's downloadable content (DLC), The Order of Giants, Alan Wake 2, and more.

item.title: Paul W.S. Anderson Can’t Help But Return to Video Game Zombies
item.description: 'The Last of Us' and 'Superman' actress Isabela Merced is set to star in Anderson's upcoming 'House of the Dead' movie.

item.title: You Couldn’t Afford Nvidia’s Next Gen GPUs, Even if You Wanted Them
item.description: The problem isn’t future graphic card delays; it’s today’s skyrocketing prices.

item.title: More Than 800 Google Workers Urge Company to Cancel Any Contracts With ICE and CBP
item.description: The campaign is among the largest anti-ICE protests by workers at a single company since federal agents shot and killed two people in Minneapolis last month.

item.title: Analogue’s 4K N64 is getting five new transparent color options
item.description: Analogue has announced another collection of limited-edition colors for its modern remake of the Nintendo 64. Last December it introduced several transparent versions of the Analogue 3D inspired by Nintendo's Funtastic N64 series, but this time the company says it drew inspiration from colored versions of the nearly 30-year-old console that Nintendo prototyped, but never […]...

item.title: What happens when Waymo runs into a tornado? Or an elephant?
item.description: An autonomous vehicle drives down a lonely stretch of highway. Suddenly, a massive tornado appears in the distance. What does the driverless vehicle do next? This is just one of the scenarios that Waymo can simulate in the "hyper realistic" virtual world that it has just created with help from Google's DeepMind. Waymo's World Model […]

item.title: I tested Samsung’s outrageously fast 500Hz OLED gaming monitor and it blew my mind – but there’s a huge catch
item.description: Samsung's latest 27-inch 500Hz OLED gaming monitor, the Odyssey OLED G6 G60SF, is incredibly fast, but that does come at a cost.

item.title: Charlie Puth admits he ‘applied’ to sing at the Super Bowl. It shows how one key personality trait fuels success
item.description: The Grammy-nominated star recently told Rolling Stone that he ‘applied’ and ‘auditioned’ to sing Sunday’s national anthem at the big game. Just because you’re an ultra-talented global celebrity doesn’t mean you’re a shoo-in for an amazing gig. In fact, even stars have to apply to jobs, just like the rest of us. Just ask Charlie Puth, who’ll be singing “The Star-Spangled Banner” at Super Bowl LX Sunday night....

item.title: Asus TUF Gaming A18 : RTX 5070, écran QHD+ 240 Hz et 400 € de réduction sur ce monstre de 18 pouces
item.description: L’Asus TUF Gaming A18 s’impose comme une vraie bonne affaire pour les gamers grâce à son écran XXL 18" QHD+ à 240 Hz ultra-fluide et sa RTX 5070 capable de faire tourner les titres récents sans broncher. S'il fallait débourser 2 299 euros pour l'acquérir, aujourd'hui il revient à 1 899 euros.

item.title: Constraints do not limit creativity—they unlock it
item.description: The fastest path to innovation is designing inside real human limits.

item.title: Presidents' Day sales 2026: The best early tech deals from Apple, Sony, Roku and others
item.description: You can find a lot of good deals for Presidents’ Day, but to say it’s a tech-deal boon would be an overstatement. The best Presidents’ Day deals are usually on mattresses, appliances and furniture, but you can find some decent tech sales thrown in as well. This year, Presidents’ Day comes right after Valentine’s Day and Super Bowl 2026, which means there are even more chances to save as sales and discounts overlap. If you’re looking for a new streaming device, a fresh iPad or an upgraded vacuum so you can enter the spring-cleaning season properly, we have you covered. These are the best Presid...
